means: [男子名] 贾斯珀来源于波斯语，含义是“司库”(treasurer)
[地名] [加拿大、美国] 贾斯珀

sentence.Network_en: Jasper has put up " No Parking'signs outside his gate, but these have not had any effect.
sentence.Network_cn: 贾斯珀 “ 把禁止停车”的牌子挂在大门外, 但这没产生什么效果.

sentence.Network_en: Jasper hopes that she will turn cars and their owners to stone.
sentence.Network_cn: 贾斯珀希望她把汽车和车主们都变成石头.

sentence.Network_en: Jasper White is one of rare people who believes in ancient myths.
sentence.Network_cn: 贾斯珀.怀特是少有的相信古代神话的人之一.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (originally denoting any bright-coloured chalcedony other than carnelian): from Old French jasp(r)e, from Latin iaspis, from Greek, of oriental origin

means.word_mean: 1. an opaque form of quartz; red or yellow or brown or dark green in color; used for ornamentation or as a gemstone

example.en: A Western needs something more than two jaspers in the hick town.
example.zh: 一个西方人需要的东西比小乡镇里两个乡巴佬要的还多。2神学院学生，逆来顺受的虔诚教徒

example.en: Martin looks stuffy, but he's no jasper.
example.zh: 马丁看上去样子很 古板保守，不过他不是虔诚的教徒。
